Generation V.Black: This Pokémon brings victory. It is said that Trainers with Victini always win, regardless of the type of encounter.
Generation V.White: It creates an unlimited supply of energy inside its body, which it shares with those who touch it.
Generation V.Black 2: When it shares the infinite energy it creates, that being's entire body will be overflowing with power.
Generation V.White 2: When it shares the infinite energy it creates, that being's entire body will be overflowing with power.

Generation VI.Y: When it shares the infinite energy it creates, that being's entire body will be overflowing with power.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: This Pokémon brings victory. It is said that Trainers with Victini always win, regardless of the type of encounter.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: When it shares the infinite energy it creates, that being's entire body will be overflowing with power.
